hackathon-description-text: HackTheMidlands is a 24-hour, inclusive hackathon being hosted in Birmingham on the 1st-2nd October 2016 at Millennium Point.
hackathon-eligibility: Anybody over the age of 14 can take part, that's the only limit!
hackathon-requirements: You must submit your work at 10am on Sunday morning or your project will not be considered for competing. You can submit your project on devpost after you have registered your team for the hackathon.
hackathon-rules:
All rules for the event follow the Hack Code of Conduct which can be found 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This is awarded to the first place Hacking team!
This is the award for the second place team!
This is the award for the third place team!
Most creative use of - Mash it up, Visualise it, Have fun with it!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Majestic: Best use of Majestic API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This award is for the hackee that submits the best tweet to us with the #hackthemidlands
Best use of the millenium point data

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
We will choose a winner based on the project that we like the best and that we think inspires the true spirit of a hackathon.

The judging panel will consist of organisers and sponsors.
Each sponsor providing a challenge will give individual awards for teams that use Sponsor Challenges.

hackathon-description-header: Are you ready to Hack The Midlands?
